data.name: 学霸的星期天
data.detailed_description:
Xiao Ming is an ordinary high school student. One weekend, he was in the study room as usual, working on the newly bought mock papers. Because he didn’t have a good rest last night, he was only halfway through writing the test papers, and Xiao Ming dozed off and lay on his back. On the desk, he fell asleep. . He fell into a dreamland, fell into the simulation paper he was writing, and the exercises in the paper came to life as if he had come to life, and became familiar scientists: Einstein, Marie Curie, Tesla, Mendeleev, Newton, Darwin, Hawking, etc., if they want to get out of the dream, they can only beat these scientists and complete this simulation volume

Game Features:

*The game currently has 4 optional characters, each with different skills;

*The game bosses are all familiar scientists, such as Newton, Einstein, Tesla, etc. Their tricks are also closely related to their own research fields, such as Tesla's lightning attack;

*The game uses 2D arcade mode, which can support 2-4 people to play online;

*The game has 9 large levels, 1 hidden level, and a large number of monster types;

*The scene in the game will change according to the background of the scientist. The scenes of each level have their own characteristics, and the skills of the monsters will also match the background of the scientist.
If you want to get out of the dream, you can only defeat these scientists and complete this simulation volume.

data.short_description: This is a 2D arcade adventure game. The character controlled by the player is an ordinary high school student, who falls into the test paper of the dream, and challenges scientists of different disciplines in the dream to get out of the dream.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 - 64 bit (32 bit NOT supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M @ 2.60GHz or equivalent AMD processor and above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB DX 9 Compliant videocard with pixel shader 3,0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1024 x 768
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 - 64 bit (32 bit NOT supported)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.2 GHz or equivalent AMD processor and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB DX 9 Compliant videocard with pixel shader 3,0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1024 x 768

data.legal_notice:
抵制不良游戏，拒绝盗版游戏。
注意自我保护，谨防受骗上当。
适度游戏益脑，沉迷游戏伤身。
合理安排时间，享受健康生活。
